word:
W. C. WHITE LETTER TO L. E. FROOM, JANUARY 8, 1928 

DEAR BROTHER FROOM: 
     SINCE SENDING AWAY A LETTER TO YOU YESTERDAY I HAVE 
                                                                           454
FOUND YOURS OF DECEMBER 22. IN IT YOU TELL ME THAT FOR TWO FULL YEARS YOU HAVE BEEN ENCOURAGING ELDER DANIELLS TO PREPARE A BOOK ON THE SPIRIT OF PROPHECY, BUT YOU FAILED TO TELL ME WHAT RESPONSE HE GIVES TO THESE REQUESTS.
